description.narrative: 1. Support of private healthcare provider in frontier region: The Project will channel the much-needed private sector capital to finance a new hospital in the frontier region where patients may have better access to quality healthcare services. 2. Sharing of best practices: Best management and clinical practices will be transferred from Asia Heart''s operations to the newly acquired hospitals and the greenfield hospital, hence raising the quality of healthcare services in the country. 3. Employment generation: The expansionary aspects of this project will provide employment opportunities to healthcare workers in China. 4. Promoting healthcare reform: Despite the recent lift on restrictions over private investment in healthcare sector, the Chinese health authorities are still cautious due to negative publicity about private hospitals and the lack of successful examples. The ongoing success of Asia Heart may improve health authorities'' confidence in private healthcare providers and may further promote private players to enter the sector.

Hong Kong Asia Medical Holding Co., Ltd (Asia Medical or the Company) is a holding company registered in Hong Kong SAR, China, that engages in the hospital business and hotel management. Through Wuhan Asia Industrial Co., Ltd (Asia Industrial), a wholly owned foreign enterprise (WOFE) registered in China, Asia Medical holds four hospitals (collectively Asia Heart or the Hospital Group), including Wuhan Asia Heart Hospital (WAH or the Hospital) , which is the flagship cardiovascular hospital founded in 1999, Asia Heart Xinjiang Hospital (Xinjiang Hospital) which was acquired in 2010, Asia Heart No.7 Hospital (No.7 Hospital) which is the state-owned hospital managed by WAH on a 25-year management contract starting from Feb 2011, and Asia Heart Jiangcheng Hospital (Jiangcheng Hospital or the Project), which is the 1,850-bed greenfield hospital expected to open in 2016. IFC will provide US$35 million financing to Asia Medical to support the construction of Jiangcheng Hospital.
